CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Under simulated solar illumination of AM 1.5G ( 100 mW / cm^2 ) , a PCE of 4.6% has been achieved for PSCs composed of PSFDTBT and PC71BM as the active layer in simply processed devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| PSCs (composed of PSFDTBT and PC71BM) |
| AM 1.5G |
| Simulated solar illumination (AM 1.5G with 100 mW / cm^2^) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| PSCs (composed of PSFDTBT and PC71BM) |

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |

Note: "simulated solar illumination" is a single property, even though it includes multiple components (AM 1.5G and 100 mW / cm^2).

Paragraph: Under simulated solar illumination of AM 1.5G ( 100 mW / cm^2 ) , a PCE of 4.6% has been achieved for PSCs composed of PSFDTBT and PC71BM as the active layer in simply processed devices.

Let's think step by step.

| simply processed devices |

Note: AM 1.5G is a standard solar spectrum, it is not a material property and was included for context, but it can be removed if not considered relevant to the material properties.
